mapper.sql: SELECT product_store_plm.id AS id, product_store_plm.prod_no AS prodNo, product_store_plm.prod_name AS prodName, product_store_plm.norms AS norms, product_store_plm.param AS param, product_store_plm.model_desc AS modelDesc, product_store_plm.type_id AS typeId, product_store_plm.unit AS unit, product_store_plm.allow_no AS allowNo, product_store_plm.patent_no AS patentNo, product_store_plm.sell_no AS sellNo, product_store_plm.version_no AS versionNo, product_store_plm.`level` AS `LEVEL`, product_store_plm.material AS material, product_store_plm.quality_time AS qualityTime, product_store_plm.prod_status AS prodStatus, product_store_plm.rock_position AS rockPosition, product_store_plm.store_id AS storeId, product_store_plm.cur_amount AS curAmount, product_store_plm.factory_id AS factoryId, product_store_plm.wares_id AS waresId, product_store_plm.remark AS remark, product_store_plm.deleted AS deleted, product_store_plm.company_id AS companyId, product_store_plm.create_time AS createTime, product_store_plm.create_by AS createBy, product_store_plm.modify_time AS modifyTime, product_store_plm.modify_by AS modifyBy, prod_type_crm.type_desc AS typeDesc
